ALERT_DANGER_USERNAME_PASSWORD_MISMATCH: The username and password do not match our records, please try again.
SSP_CONFIG_INSTRUCTIONS: Use this form to configure the technical details of the integration with Student Success Plan. Most importantly set the threshold that will be used to trigger early alerts.
SSP_CONFIG_FORM_URL_HELP: The base URL of the target SSP instance (e.g., https://ssp.com/)
SSP_CONFIG_FORM_RISKRULE_HELP: Model output records that meet the selected threshold or above will trigger an early alert
